item.title: Hugo no style please Demo
item.description: TOC To enable it, all you need to do when creating a new post at the very top is to insert the code: toc = true tocBorder = true Details Click me A lot of text or something else. {< details summary="Click me" >} A lot of text or something else. {< /details >} Styles /config.toml appearance = "auto" you can change it to 2 predefined styles: light and dark. It can be also set to auto and the color scheme will match the user’s system style.
